mapper.select: select c.contents_num ,c.contents_title ,c.thumbnail ,c.category ,c.contents_url ,c.contents_hits from contents c, category g where g.category_kr = #{category_kr} and c.category = g.category
select contents_num ,contents_title ,thumbnail ,category ,contents_url ,contents_hits from contents order by contents_num desc
select * from ( select contents_num ,contents_title ,thumbnail ,category ,contents_url ,contents_hits from contents order by SYS.DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) where rownum < 19

select c.CONTENTS_NUM ,c.CONTENTS_TITLE ,c.THUMBNAIL ,c.CONTENTS_URL ,c.CONTENTS_HITS from contents c , transcript t where t.TS_TEXT like '%'||#{searchtext}||'%' and t.contents_num = c.contents_num group by c.contents_num, c.contents_title , c.thumbnail , c.contents_url , c.contents_hits

select c.contents_num ,c.contents_title ,c.thumbnail ,c.category ,c.contents_url ,c.contents_hits from contents c, bookmark b where b.contents_num = c.contents_num and b.member_id = #{loginId} group by c.contents_num, c.contents_title , c.thumbnail , c.category, c.contents_url , c.contents_hits
